metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to subsurface drainage and to surface drainage
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to subsurface drainage and to surface drainage

requirements.description: Drainage for crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.18
requirements.exact_quote: Drainage for crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.18

requirements.description: Drainage requirements beneath floors-on-ground shall conform to Section 9.16
requirements.exact_quote: Drainage requirements beneath floors-on-ground shall conform to Section 9.16

requirements.description: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, the bottom of every exterior foundation wall shall be drained by drainage tile or pipe laid around the exterior of the foundation in conformance with Subsection 9.14.3 or by a layer of gravel or crushed rock in conformance with Subsection 9.14.4
requirements.exact_quote: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, the bottom of every exterior foundation wall shall be drained by drainage tile or pipe laid around the exterior of the foundation in conformance with Subsection 9.14.3 or by a layer of gravel or crushed rock in conformance with Subsection 9.14.4

requirements.description: Where mineral fibre insulation or crushed rock backfill is provided adjacent to the exterior surface of a foundation wall, the insulation or backfill shall extend to the footing level to facilitate the drainage of groundwater to the foundation's drainage system
requirements.exact_quote: the insulation or backfill shall extend to the footing level to facilitate the drainage of groundwater to the foundation's drainage system
conditions: mineral fibre insulation or crushed rock backfill adjacent to foundation wall

requirements.description: Any pyritic material in the crushed rock shall be limited to a concentration that will not damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies
requirements.exact_quote: any pyritic material in the crushed rock shall be limited to a concentration that will not damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies

requirements.description: Drain tile and drain pipe for foundation drainage shall conform to applicable standards
requirements.exact_quote: Drain tile and drain pipe for foundation drainage shall conform to

applicable_standards.title: Standard Specification for Clay Drain Tile and Perforated Clay Drain Tile
Standard Specification for Concrete Drain Tile
Standard Specification for Perforated Concrete Pipe
Standard Specification for Vitrified Clay Pipe, Extra Strength, Standard Strength, and Perforated
Polyethylene (PE) Pipe and Fittings for Soil and Foundation Drainage
Plastic drain and sewer pipe and pipe fittings

requirements.description: Drain tile or pipe used for foundation drainage shall be not less than 100 mm in diameter
requirements.exact_quote: Drain tile or pipe used for foundation drainage shall be not less than 100 mm in diam.

requirements.description: Drain tile or pipe shall be laid on undisturbed or well-compacted soil so that the top of the tile or pipe is below the bottom of the floor slab or the ground cover of the crawl space
requirements.exact_quote: Drain tile or pipe shall be laid on undisturbed or well-compacted soil so that the top of the tile or pipe is below the bottom of the floor slab or the ground cover of the crawl space

requirements.description: Drain tile or pipe with butt joints shall be laid with 6 mm to 10 mm open joints
requirements.exact_quote: Drain tile or pipe with butt joints shall be laid with 6 mm to 10 mm open joints

requirements.description: The top half of joints shall be covered with sheathing paper, 0.10 mm polyethylene or No. 15 asphalt or tar-saturated felt
requirements.exact_quote: The top half of joints referred to in Sentence (2) shall be covered with sheathing paper, 0.10 mm polyethylene or No. 15 asphalt or tar-saturated felt

requirements.description: The top and sides of drain pipe or tile shall be covered with not less than 150 mm of crushed stone or other coarse clean granular material containing not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve
requirements.exact_quote: The top and sides of drain pipe or tile shall be covered with not less than 150 mm of crushed stone or other coarse clean granular material containing not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve

material_specifications.type: crushed stone or coarse clean granular material

requirements.description: Granular material used to drain the bottom of a foundation shall consist of a continuous layer of crushed stone or other coarse clean granular material containing not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve, and no pyritic material in a concentration that will damage the building
requirements.exact_quote: Granular material used to drain the bottom of a foundation shall consist of a continuous layer of crushed stone or other coarse clean granular material containing a) not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve, and b) no pyritic material in a concentration that will damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies

material_specifications.type: crushed stone or coarse clean granular material

requirements.description: Granular material shall be laid on undisturbed or compacted soil to a minimum depth of not less than 125 mm beneath the footing of the building
requirements.exact_quote: Granular material described in Article 9.14.4.1. shall be laid on undisturbed or compacted soil to a minimum depth of not less than 125 mm beneath the footing of the building

requirements.description: Granular layer shall extend not less than 300 mm beyond the outside edge of the footings
requirements.exact_quote: and extend not less than 300 mm beyond the outside edge of the footings

requirements.description: The bottom of an excavation drained by a granular layer shall be graded so that the entire area described in Article 9.14.4.2 is drained to a sump conforming to Article 9.14.5.2
requirements.exact_quote: The bottom of an excavation drained by a granular layer shall be graded so that the entire area described in Article 9.14.4.2. is drained to a sump conforming to Article 9.14.5.2

requirements.description: Where because of wet site conditions soil becomes mixed with the granular drainage material, sufficient additional granular material shall be provided so that the top 125 mm are kept free of soil
requirements.exact_quote: Where because of wet site conditions soil becomes mixed with the granular drainage material, sufficient additional granular material shall be provided so that the top 125 mm are kept free of soil

requirements.description: Foundation drains shall drain to a sewer, drainage ditch or dry well
requirements.exact_quote: Foundation drains shall drain to a sewer, drainage ditch or dry well

requirements.description: Where a sump pit is provided it shall be not less than 750 mm deep
requirements.exact_quote: Where a sump pit is provided it shall be a) not less than 750 mm deep

requirements.description: Sump pit shall be not less than 0.25 m2 in area
requirements.exact_quote: b) not less than 0.25 m2 in area

requirements.description: Sump pit shall be provided with a cover
requirements.exact_quote: c) provided with a cover

requirements.description: Covers for sump pits shall be designed to resist removal by children
requirements.exact_quote: Covers for sump pits shall be designed a) to resist removal by children

requirements.description: Covers for sump pits shall be designed to be airtight in accordance with Sentence 9.25.3.3.(7)
requirements.exact_quote: b) to be airtight in accordance with Sentence 9.25.3.3.(7)

requirements.description: Where gravity drainage is not practical, an automatic sump pump shall be provided to discharge the water from the sump pit into a sewer, drainage ditch or dry well
requirements.exact_quote: Where gravity drainage is not practical, an automatic sump pump shall be provided to discharge the water from the sump pit described in Sentence (1) into a sewer, drainage ditch or dry well

requirements.description: Dry wells may be used only when located in areas where the natural groundwater level is below the bottom of the dry well
requirements.exact_quote: Dry wells may be used only when located in areas where the natural groundwater level is below the bottom of the dry well

requirements.description: Dry wells shall be not less than 5 m from the building foundation and located so that drainage is away from the building
requirements.exact_quote: Dry wells shall be not less than 5 m from the building foundation and located so that drainage is away from the building

requirements.description: The building shall be located or the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building
requirements.exact_quote: The building shall be located or the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building

articles.title: Drainage away from Wells or Septic Disposal Beds

requirements.description: Surface drainage shall be directed away from the location of a water supply well or septic tank disposal bed
requirements.exact_quote: Surface drainage shall be directed away from the location of a water supply well or septic tank disposal bed

requirements.description: Every window well shall be drained to the footing level or other suitable location
requirements.exact_quote: Every window well shall be drained to the footing level or other suitable location

requirements.description: Where runoff water from a driveway is likely to accumulate or enter a garage, a catch basin shall be installed to provide adequate drainage
requirements.exact_quote: Where runoff water from a driveway is likely to accumulate or enter a garage, a catch basin shall be installed to provide adequate drainage
conditions: runoff water from driveway likely to accumulate or enter garage

requirements.description: Downspouts shall conform to Article 9.26.18.2
requirements.exact_quote: Downspouts shall conform to Article 9.26.18.2
